name: df-minusg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cminusg, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ invg =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ iota(s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(s2[(+ ` s0)]s1)=(0 ` s0))))
comment: Define inverse of group element. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)
